General.Name: Loihde Oyj
General.Description: Loihde Oyj, through its subsidiaries, provides digital development and security solutions in Finland. The company offers digital strategy consulting, business intelligence, and data analytics services, as well as user interface design and cloud technologies related solutions. It also engages in network connections to locking and electronic security technology services. In addition, the company offers cyber and corporate security related services. The company was formerly known as Viria Oyj and changed its name to Loihde Oyj in May 2021. The company was founded in 1882 and is based in Vaasa, Finland.
